clawdbot_findings.creator: @steipete (Peter Steinberger)
clawdbot_findings.description: Personal AI assistant managing digital life: emails, calendar, iMessage, home automation
key_features: Multi-channel: WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Slack, Mattermost
Self-modifying code - can rewrite itself and restart

notable_tweets.author: @WolframRvnwlf
notable_tweets.content: Clawdbot truly is next level - haven't been this excited about AI in a long time! Spent whole weekend setting it up, now my sassy AI assistant Amy is finally running persistently on my Home Assistant box

notable_tweets.author: @tobi_bsf
notable_tweets.content: Meet Clawd – my new AI assistant running 24/7 on a mini PC at home. Daily reminders, GitHub tracking, weekly accountability nudges for my 2026 goals

notable_tweets.author: @RayFernando1337
notable_tweets.content: Clawdbot is single handedly crushing AI personal assistants and it's open source and runs on your own device

notable_tweets.author: @heyitsyashu
notable_tweets.content: Turned AI into my personal executive assistant. It's handling my emails, calendar events, tasks and can API into any other tools. It's like Claude code but as a personal Jarvis

notable_tweets.author: @iamkasparp
notable_tweets.content: It monitors my baby's room temp while she sleeps, vacuums... I named mine Skippy and his personality is trained based off that. He's a fun guy to talk too

notable_tweets.author: @steipete
notable_tweets.content: You don't need an agent orchestrator setup. You want a personal assistant that can log into any computer, look at your terminals and type for you

steipete_tips.tip: Discord provider + browser tools for autonomous web browsing
Group chat lurking - agents can observe without responding
Hooks system for email triggers and automation
Background bash tool prevents hanging on CLI breaks
Agent can rewrite its own code and trigger restart
Voice call plugin for phone automation
Template system for workspace personality customization

notable_quotes.quote: The single greatest application of AI
Good breakdown of the architecture behind OpenClaw

key_projects.name: CLI Agent Orchestrator (CAO)
key_projects.description: Multi-agent orchestration framework for developer CLI tools

key_projects.name: LangGraph Multi-Agent Supervisor
key_projects.description: Hierarchical AI teams with supervisor agents coordinating specialized workflows

key_projects.name: Claude Code Multi-Agent
key_projects.description: Official multi-agent orchestration, disabled by default, can be enabled via CC Mirror

key_projects.name: Docker cagent
key_projects.description: CLI for building intelligent agents in YAML with multi-agent orchestration

patterns: Execs delegate to chief agent → department heads → specialized sub-agents
Parallel agent orchestration with live token sharing

claude_agent_sdk.rebrand: Claude Code SDK → Claude Agent SDK
claude_agent_sdk.workshop: 2-hour Claude Agent SDK workshop by @trq212 at AI Engineer

key_concepts.name: MemGPT
key_concepts.description: LLM agent manages context window like OS manages memory - uses large persistent memory, agent decides what goes in context

key_concepts.name: AgeMem
key_concepts.description: Unified framework integrating long-term and short-term memory via tool-based actions (ADD, UPDATE, DELETE, RETRIEVE, SUMMARY, FILTER)

key_concepts.name: mem-agent-mcp
key_concepts.description: MCP server for any LLM to use memory management in background

best_practices: Long-term memory persists across all stages, short-term context resets between stages
Unified memory policy beats separate heuristics for each memory type
Tool-based memory operations let agent learn when/how to invoke memory

delegation_patterns.hierarchy: Chief Agent → Department Heads → Specialized Sub-agents
delegation_patterns.key_insight: Sub-agents and skills are different concepts - sub-agents handle async tasks, skills are reusable procedures
tools: Claude Code /agents command for custom subagents
Dynamic subagent selection based on description fields
Begin with Claude-generated agents, iterate with 'e' to edit

key_quote.content: The more skills you build, the more useful Claude Code gets. Skills are the way you make Claude Code more knowledgeable over time

skills_system.anthropic_talk: Skills > Agents - procedural knowledge and continuous learning

alex_finn_findings.business: Creator Buddy - AI trained on X posts ($300k ARR)

key_tips.tip: Claude mobile app has Code section - spin up cloud AI agents that work while you sleep
key_tips.action: Every night kick off 3 small tasks before bed

key_tips.tip: Use Claude as business/life coach - tell it daily goals for feedback
key_tips.tools: Claude for coaching, Grok for research, ManusAI for agent work

key_tips.tip: Claude for Chrome can control browser - great for research automation
key_tips.opinion: Best AI tool other than Claude Code

key_tips.tip: Google Antigravity spawns army of AI agents to build apps

ai_usage: 1-shotted rank and rent sites with AI
Used Neuron Writer for suggested terms
Submit .txt files as prompts on Cursor to bypass char limit
local_seo_tips: NAP consistency critical - 'Ste 105' vs 'Suite 105' causes ranking loss
Build citations on Yelp, Yellow Pages, TripAdvisor, Facebook, industry directories

critical: Bind gateway to loopback - hundreds of vulnerable gateways found on Shodan
DM policy: default to 'pairing' mode, manually approve devices
Use Tailscale/Cloudflare Tunnel for remote access
Never share API keys carelessly - agent has access to them
